alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Harnett (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 04 at 12:53PM EST until January 04 at 1:30PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM EST FOR SAMPSON...SOUTHEASTERN HARNETT...EASTERN CUMBERLAND AND SOUTHWESTERN JOHNSTON COUNTIES... At 1252 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Godwin to 16 miles south of Dunn to 9 miles southwest of Clinton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...A peak wind gust of 62 mph was observed at KFAY aiport at 1234 PM with this line of storms. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Dunn, Benson, Godwin, Erwin, Roseboro, Newton Grove, Wade, Salemburg and Turkey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for central North Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
